snippet: Demonstrations in São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and Belo Horizonte reflected resentment over efforts to cover budget shortfalls.
abstract: Bus fare increases in several major Brazilian cities, instituted in response to country's foundering economy, provoke violent protests.
lead_paragraph: Demonstrations in São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro and Belo Horizonte reflected resentment over efforts to cover budget shortfalls.

headline.main: Brazil: Protest Over Higher Bus Fares Erupt in 3 Cities
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Protests Over Higher Bus Fares Erupt in 3 Cities
